DOC.brief_summary: Patients with recent diagnosis and treatment of a brain tumor will complete a short questionnaire concerning the patient's quality of life and emotional state since receiving treatment. Caregivers will complete a one-page questionnaire concerning the patient's quality of life and emotional state since receiving treatment.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are between 3 months and one year out from treatment for their brain tumor Karnofsky Performance Status (KPS) >= 60 Age 18 years or over, any gender, any race "patient caregivers will be individuals who provide the most daytoday care for their respective brain tumor patients No exclusions
